评论详情: Loved this dress.  Received many compliments.  Nice quality, true to size, flowy and comfortable.  Steams well.  Sleeves make this one pop.
Fits perfectly! Fabric is beautiful! Love it! So versatile and stylish! Loads of compliments!
This dress is beautiful! I do recommend getting a bet to show your curves - its a little boxy otherwise - but its super cute!
Looks like the picture. A little see through, runs big.

评论概述: Made by someone who understands REAL women's bodies......
评论详情: Will post photos later!  Purchased for my mom. She's been self conscious about her body and stays away from dresses. I purchased a 2XL in burgundy. Mom is 250 lbs, 5'7" and normally wears a 3X. This was pretty, delicate, lightweight and very versatile. Could dress down with sneakers or up with sandals or heels. And best of all, it has POCKETS! That sealed the deal for me.  The sleeves are lacy and may snag easily. But It is not an issue that would cause me to change my mind. I purchased another in green for myself.

I love this dress! It is so flattering and so comfortable! If you’re like me I find it incredibly helpful to know other people’s sizes and compare to mine to see what I size I think would fit me best. So here are mine I’m 5’7, 230lbs, I have a mom belly and I’m more top heavy, my shoulders are wide as well. I wear a 44b or c bra or xxl/xxxl sports bras. With all that being said I ordered an XXL and I LOVE this dress! I wear it all the time! It fits perfectly up top, it’s not tight at all and also not overly loose! The arms are super cute as well! It’s not a heavy, hot fabric! It’s very breathable!

评论概述: Cute, but weird fabric and can't get the wrinkles out
评论详情: Cute, runs big, and, unless you have an iron or steamer, you cannot get the wrinkles out - maybe this dress was folded in the package for years.... not sure but think it has something to do with the fabric. Looks flowing but it's flowy with wrinkles from top to bottom. If I'd realized this sooner, I would have returned it.

This dress is beautiful. I ordered two sizes to see which fit perfect. The dress is super light weight and flowy. Bigger chest ladies I highly recommend to size up one or two sizes. I’m normally a large and it was a little snug on my chest. I will say the white dress is very see through as well. I will definitely get this dress in different colors.

评论概述: Super cute dress, but did not work for me
评论详情: I really wanted to love this dress, but unfortunately couldn't. The sleeves were adorable but it was see through for me. I ordered the white color. I am pregnant and was getting this for a baby shower but it was not flattering with my bump. Overall, it just did not work for me, I think maybe not being pregnant would be better and a different color!
Comfortable dress and looks nice as well

This overall was a cute dress. The sleeves were very cute with the lace material. It added just enough elegance to the dress. I did send it back b/c I wasn't completely satisfied with how it looked on me. I felt the dress just hung on me. There isn't any "shape" to the dress.
Loved the dress! The sleeves are so pretty and it's flowy love the dark green was perfect for Christmas pictures I would recommend.
Just bought in a 2nd color.  Super flattering.  Great dress!

This is a beautiful baby doll dress and I ordered it in the burgundy. The fit is loose and the sleeves are beautiful. It's a lightweight so you could wear it in the summer, spring or even in the fall. I just want to say again how beautiful the sleeves are. The length is great just slightly above the knees  so you can wear it with boots or flats or even dress it up with heels. Also I like the fact that its machine washable you can't go wrong with this beautiful dress!

Beautiful dress, just the color I was looking for the caramel color is like a burnt orange just what I was looking for for thanksgiving. Good quality. Got a 2x I feel it runs true to size I’m 5’1 plus size apple shape it’s not short on me. Hits my knee. Absolutely beautiful!
Perfect
This is a perfect dress for my boho wedding.  It is very flattering on all my bridesmaids.
Great
Very cute and easy to throw on

I love this dress.❤️It's good quality, comfortable, and beautiful. I ordered it to wear to for a white theme event. Mistakenly,  I ordered a large instead of medium size, so it was a little big. It was too late to return in time for the event, so I wore it with a very nice tan belt with matching shoes and handbag, and received so much compliments. So I would add, VERSATILE to the list! 😄
Love this dress! It has a little bit of stretch in it which makes it comfortable.
Light weight, packs great, resists wrinkles, length is right above the knee and it has pockets!!
A comfortable, flowy dress

I wear this as a tunic over tights or jeans and I have received many compliments (I do look good in this color, which is a sheer burnt orange). I was at the office when I realized that it also has pockets and my coworkers were also delighted with me. I like the lace sleeves that allow for a cooler experience, but don't take away from the long sleeve effect. I feel pretty wearing this.
Very nicely made. Beautiful dress. Size down for a better fit.

I am 5'0 and weigh 145 lbs.  The medium fit me perfectly.  It doesn't come in petite size so it is slightly below my knees.  However, I think it is still flattering on my body.  It doesn't hug me tightly, concealing my pregnancy fat.  I've also gotten compliments on this dress.  The neckline, ruffles, and long puff sleeves add elegance.  The pockets add functionality, and the material is breathable and cool.  I wore this on a summer day to a birthday dinner and I felt comfortable throughout the party.  It was easy to move around in, even while chasing and carrying my toddler.  One thing I had to be careful with is getting the lace sleeves caught on things, so to preserve that part of the dress, I wouldn't wear it anywhere that requires a lot of movement.  I'd wear it again to a photoshoot or to dinner when my toddler is more calm.

This dress is so cute and comfortable. It is true to size no stretch to the material. The fabric is light weight, perfect summer dress. The sleeves fit well. The chest area is true to size as well. The dress just at my knees. I have worn this dress to multiple functions and it always looks good. I am 5'3 wear a 20-22
this is my favorite dress I own, it is so light and airy and so flattering
I was so excited for this but it looks awful on me. It is not flattering to my bust line. The lace is also itchy. I am very sad that it doesn't work for me.

This dress was perfect to wear for my family photo session. I love the feminine lace sleeves. It's not too short and not too long, which makes it versatile for many occasions. The fabric is flowy and breathable and doesn't bunch or stick to my body. Great dress!
This is a simple dress to pop on and feel pretty in!  It is very modest and perfect for a conservative occasion.
Very comfortable dress, size is perfect. A bit on the baggy side but kinda prefer it that way. The price is great no problem so far. Would recommend it.

The color is a deep orange color and it's very pretty in my opinion. I love the lace sleeves, such a cute touch! I don't find the material to be itchy either, which is always a plus. I find the dress to be very forgiving and would be flattering on most body types. The flowy nature provides some forgiveness in my problem areas. I personally don't normally wear dresses this short, so I will likely pair it with leggings of some sort, pantyhose, and maybe jeans. Overall, it is a very cute find.

评论概述: Very cute and perfect for summer
评论详情: Very Roomy and comfortable but still looks polished and like you put some effort in. I love the detailing on the sleeves, casual enough to wear around the house or to the store, but jazzy enough to wear out for drinks etc. I love this dress!

The dress is great and looks just like the picture. I went up one size  to be sure it fit through the shoulders and bust but  I could have gone with my usual size. The fabric is light weight,  soft and flowy but drapes nicely and covers well. No need for a slip. The color is vibrant and did not fade when I washed it in cold water. The sleeves are beautiful. I now own it in three colors, green, hot pink and white and love them all. I’m tempted to order a few more and probably will because it will pair well with tights and boots when fall comes.

This dress is exactly how it looks, loose, billowy, tent shaped. All qualities that are delightful for the summer. It is also, however, very plain. Not in a bad way, but in a 'I can make this MY style' kind of way. You want prep? Add some gladiator sandals and a big floppy sunhat. You want goth? Black Docs and an elaborate choker. Boho/Cottagecore? Sandals, a woven belt, and a long pendant. Casual? Throw on some Converse/Vans and you're good to go! No matter what, this dress can easily blend into various styles. I always recommend going a size up and this dress is no exception. You can always cinch in a baggy dress!
This is a very nice looking dress. Fits slightly larger than expected. Comfortable, soft fabric. Well made. Nice deal! Solid fabric dress with long lace sleeves (see pictures).

评论概述: Flattering for some, but not for all
评论详情: I ordered this dress in 2 sizes.  The XXL was way too huge all the way around.  The XL fit perfect.....except the chest area was super tight.  I loved the style of this dress and the sheer sleeves were a very nice touch.  If the chest area had fit, I would probably have kept it.  It hit just at the knee and for reference I'm 5'6", 195lbs and have a 40D chest
Very cute and flattering dress. Sheerness is good and the material is slight cooling and not so thick
love the material, cute and comfortable
This is comfortable and easy to wear. The sleeves are very pretty and give it just the right amount of “dressy” factor to make it great for date night.

This is such a cute green dress! Overall very comfortable and smooth material the lace sleeves I was worried would be itchy but they are actually like a soft material and it’s really the perfect length for me being not too short or long.

评论概述: I wanted to love this dress but.......
评论详情: This dress came beautifully packaged. I was so excited when it arrived. I love the style of this dress. The lace sleeves are nice for any time of year, yet perfect for the warmer months. I can have the longer sleeve I need for work with the coolness of a short sleeve. After taking it out of the packaging, I loved the vibrant burgundy. I was a bit worried when I held it up and noticed I could see the light from the window straight through the dress. I tried the dress on and loved the way it felt. The material is soft and comfortable. The two tier ruffles at the bottom are the "in" look right now and they do look adorable. The dress did seem a bit shorter than I had expected. It fell well above my knees. However, I am taller at 5'9 so the shortness of the dress should have been expected. I wore it to work a few days later and got many compliments on the color and style. However, as I had feared, one of my co-workers remarked about how thin the dress looked and she could see through the bottom ruffle. She could see my legs under the dress. Half way through the day I was delighted to realize that this dress has pockets. I must not have read the description of the item completely or maybe I skimmed over it because I did not remember that was a feature of the dress. Dresses with pockets are not common so if you want one with that unexpected feature, this dress may be for you. I wanted to be in love with this dress. It does have very positive points as well as draw backs. The comfort of the material and the style were a hit with me but I could not get past the uncomfortable thought that people were staring through the bottom ruffle at my legs all day and it was a little too short for my liking. I think I will wear it again with leggings under it to fix my uncomfortable feeling of both it being too short and the semi see through aspect of it. But, I did want it to be a dress and not a long top, so that makes me a bit sad.

Super cute and comfortable. I got this for my daughter to wear to her graduation and it is very cute. We added a dress belt so it doesn't look like she is swimming in it and to give it more of a dressy look. She can wear it without the belt to give it more of a dress/casual look. The material is very flowy. We are very pleased with it.

评论概述: REVERTING BACK TO OUR BABY DOLL DAYS
评论详情: I'm an Amazon Reviewer - Love the revert back a few decades to the Baby Doll design, yet fits all ages.  Love this dress.

3.5 stars  This material isn't the most comfortable, but I do wear something under it to help. It's especially scratchy at the waist seam. It comes to my knees, but I still prefer it as a tunic, with leggings. The sleeves ended up not being my cup of tea, so I cut them off. Now it's just a sleeveless shirt. It does have pockets, too, which I like. This isn't my favorite tunic, especially before I removed the sleeves, but I do think it will look cute on others.

评论概述: Material is comforting,cool dress for spring
评论详情: Material of this dress is very comforting ..it has loose fitting ..you can order one size down .Nice Spring dress  & this color look lovely

Super comfy dress for summer which also has pockets! Always love a dress with pockets. I have somewhat sensitive skin and the lace sleeves do have a rough slightly itchy texture to it. It's not enough to bother me. Sizes do run on the bigger side. I typically order XL to have a slightly more comfortable fit in case of shrinkage. But I probably would've ordered an L instead for this and gotten away with it. I do wish the V neck part was a tad bit lower. It's right where my necklace is which bothers me besides sometimes it ends up making my necklace hide behind the V. But overall, I'll still be wearing this dress since I love the pocket feature. It's also comfy and flowy which are always key things that I look for in a summer dress.

This dress is beautiful! I bought it because I have broken a leg and it is difficult for me to wear things right now so I have been buying a lot of dresses to wear to make it easier for the time being. This one is one of my favorites for sure! I love the sleeves the most. It is kind of short because I am really tall (5’11’’) if I bend over you can see underneath so I would make sure to be wearing regular underwear with it that’s all lol
It is cute and fits as expected. The sizing is true to size. Very happy with that. The fabric is little thin but other than that it's great.

I got this dress for church and its super cute. I wore it all day and felt super fun and cute in it. It's super comfy and I got multiple compliments on it. It was a little big but I dint notice it because it is meant to be flowy. Overall super cute.

The lace on this is not scratchy or uncomfortable. I could wear it all day and it looks great on me. I love the button in the front to secure the cross over portion on the top. It looks fancy and my spouse said it was too nice to wear out doing errands, but I’m pretty sure I’m going to keep wearing this one wherever I want. You won’t regret this.

I’m always on the lookout for a great dress to wear for a lunch, bridal shower, or a general outing where I wanna be comfortable. This stress checks all the boxes because it is flowing, comfortable, stylish and all around beautiful. the fabric is of great quality. This stress checks all the boxes because it is flowing, comfortable, the fabric is of great quality. I live in an area where is warm all year around but we pretty much live in AC so this dress is perfect because it’s great for both outdoors and  indoors. The sleeves are light and not itchy at all, and you can bring them up or keep them down and the elastic is not going to be very tight.

This is a cute dress and the sizing is accurate. I have a larger bust and there’s plenty of space. It doesn’t bell out quite like I’d hoped for, but it does an ok job of hiding my tummy.  I would say it kind of straddles the line between casual and dressy. It’s mostly casual - works for lunches, daily wear, nights out, etc. Because if the sleeves, it can almost be passed off as dressy… perhaps even more so if you layer in the right accessories.  I am happy with it though. It looks nice and I feel good wearing it.

I really like the look of this dress! The fabric for the sleeves is different from the fabric for the body of the dress. The lace pattern for the sleeves is unique, and the fabric for the sleeves is soft. This dress has pockets. Very cute!

This dress is nice and flowy but the real gem of it is the sleeves. I carry extra weight in my arms so these loose fitting sleeves are perfect. They don't look tight. The dress is well made and fits as expected.

The dress is so cute! And I wanted to wear it but the entire dress is see through and I don’t have a slip for underneath. The cut is flattering and the sleeves are high quality. Unfortunately it arrived the day I needed it and won’t be able to wear it without a black slip under. So it’s going back. It does run large. I weigh 130 and got a medium for a looser fit. But it was VERY loose. I had planned on putting a belt around the middle to give it shape until I noticed you could see my unders. 🤣  Very cute. Very flattering. Runs big. Entirely see through.

This dress is so cute. A size XL fit me well (for reference: I am 5'6" and around 220 lbs). I love the lace detail sleeves and I love that it has pockets! This dress is also super light-weight so it will be perfect for summer!

I've grown tired of wearing jeans and t-shirts all the time, and wanted to wear something truly comfortable around the house. A month or two ago I got a dress just like this one, in black, and now I have one in burgundy.  Being a mere 5' tall, this comes to mid-calf on me, and it is about as comfortable as a dress can get, yet it looks terrific.  I  did not want to wind up wearing a caftan or mu-mu, and this is perfect for me.  It is loose fitting yet somehow shows enough curves to make me feel pretty, especially with the lace sleeves.  On top of all that, it has pockets(!!!!) and launders beautifully.  So now i have two of these dresses, and I am feeling very comfortable and happy...and by the way, this dress/tunic works well with cover-ups, should you want to add some warmth to fight the overly active AC.

I got this dress for a one time special event and wasn't expecting much in this price range--I'm pleasantly surprised at how nice it is. The seams are well-finished and the neck line has a double seam. The gathering on the waist is even and it drapes nicely. It might require a slip.  The lace on the sleeves has just a bit of stretch to it, so that it is soft and less-likely to tear if snagged. Because the waist looked high to me, I was skeptical that it could be belted, but the seam is low enough to belt which totally changes the look of the dress. Nice.

We ordered this women’s Summer dress for my wife and she does like the design of the V neck, the lace lantern long sleeve, and the stylish ruffle hem. She says that she likes that the dress fits her pretty nicely, is comfortable to wear and easy to put on and take off without any issues. She has been wearing it for the for the past few days and she she says so far, so good. Highly recommended fast.

I probably should have gotten a xl. Came in a bag inside a box without a tag, so can’t give credit to designer. I love the pretty lace long sleeves and how can you resist a dress with pockets! Due to polyester fabric, I will steam rather than iron (or put into dryer on fluff for a few minutes). Falls at exactly the bottom of my knees and has two tiers. I love the beautiful wine color and will post updates if it fades after washing. Again, no tag, so I assume it is hand washed. Super flattering and hid my wobbly bits. Great with a nice wedge, some boho jewelry and a cowboy hat. Also, can be dressed up up or down from work to happy hour and dancing. This dress definitely has some ‘twirl’ in it! And did I mention the POCKETS?!? 😍

The LATH.PIN V-Neck Tunic Dress with Lace Lantern Long Sleeves is very flattering ! I always run hot so having lace on the sleeves is genius. It is a perfect length and the orange color is great for fall. I love it so much I am going to buy it in the other colors offered.

Overall I don't hate this dress.  It is definitely large and flowy.  On me, I feel like I look frumpy if I don't wear a belt with it.  I'm 5'9, 200 lbs, and wear a 12-14 typically.  Ordered the XL.  When I put a belt with it, if I keep it in line with the ruffle lines on the dress, it hits just under my breasts so it creates more of an empire waist.  I'm long in the torso, so for someone who doesn't have this problem, it probably looks better.

This dress fits true to size and the blue color is a nice dark navy blue.  It washes well, did not shrink or lost its shape.  The pockets are nice but the dress is lightweight, would not recommend putting anything heavy in the pocket.  My wife is 5'5" and this dress is not too short.
Dress fits as expected and looks great on!  Comfortable and pretty, which is sometimes are hard combination to find!  Definitely recommended.

It’s cute but not my favorite. I ordered a medium maybe a small would have fit better. Although the material doesn’t have much stretch to it so it might have not fit if it was too tight. It’s a good length, hits at my knees. The sleeves are pretty and breathable. Soft comfortable material not itchy at all.

This is a nice comfortable dress and feels good on the skin and the sleeves are pretty. It does run big. It is supposed to be a loose flowy dress, but it is very over sized. Definitely go down a size or even two depending on your shape.

评论概述: The dress has a beautiful color and a nice flow to it.
评论详情: This dress has a rich looking caramel color to it. It looks good with straw or light beige colored shoes and purse like in the picture. The fabric has a good weight to it, it is not real thin, so the dress has a nice flow to it. Only the top front of the dress has a double layer of fabric. So you do need to wear an under slip so the bottom is not so revealing, because the light will show thru the bottom of the dress. The sleeves are made of really pretty thick lace. They are flowy but have a slightly ruff and itchy texture, that is why one star was taken off. But fortunately they don't bother wife much. She loves the dress.
I like this dress, it's cute and simple. I think the lace is a little stiff and could be scratchy but otherwise it's a good dress. I think the fit is pretty accurate and sizing is standard.

I love this babydoll dress. It's so cute. The fabric and style are wonderful. I love that it's not see through and has pockets. The sleeves are all lace and are gorgeous. It's got a V-neck and a tiered skirt. I love how loose and flowy this dress is. I'm wearing this to beach outings. Very good quality. Highly recommend.
it's definitely much larger than anticipated. material and design is nice. going to see how I can make it work without it swallowing me.

This dress runs large. If you want roomy and flowy, order your usual size. If you want more if a fitted look, size down.  I’ve styled this by itself, over leggings as a tunic, and over jeans. It’s cute all ways!

评论概述: I don’t think it’s true to size.
评论详情: The dress is adorable. I feel it’s not true to size. I know it does state it’s suppose to be loose fitting. I went ahead in ordered an medium. I’ve lost about 50 lbs since November, due to the fact of a medication change. I gained a lot of weight taking it. So it’s been difficult to try to order the correct size that I feel that I need. Since it did say this is a loose fitting dress, I would really order a size down. The dresses I’ve been buying and reviewing have mostly been larges. I’m 5’2, 150 lbs and my bra size is a 36C. I hope this review kinda helps! Like I said it’s an adorable dress, I do love the sleeves…also the fabric is thin. You can look through it, and see. I held it up and I could look outside my bathroom window. So I do recommend that you wear a black slip. The dress came down to right above my knees.

评论概述: The lace sleeves are extra cute on this dress
评论详情: It’s very nice kind of loose fitting so very comfortable. The sleeves are very nice. I’m looking forward to wearing this one. :-)

This dress is cute however I am not completely happy with the styling. It looked great in the pictures on the description. But after receiving it and trying it on I have decided that this is not for me. Somehow it just does not look good on me. The fit is good and the material is ok. I just don't like the way it looks on me.
